content.overview: It allows to model a new stack widget model. Based on the Android RelativeLayout widget.
content.sourceDesc: RelativeLayout is a view group that displays child views in relative positions. The position of each view can be specified as relative to sibling elements (such as to the left-of or below another view) or in positions relative to the parent RelativeLayout area (such as aligned to the bottom, left or center).

methods.name: New
methods.description: Adds a new ZStack model to the model layout of the RecyclerView which is synced.

methods.name: BuildProps
methods.description: Returns a new property set containing the previously defined properties.

methods.name: SetHorizontalGravity
methods.description: This method changes the horizontal gravity of the widget.

methods.name: SetVerticalGravity
methods.description: This method changes the vertical gravity of the widget.

properties.name: HorizontalGravity
properties.description: Specifies the horizontal gravity of the widget.

properties.name: VerticalGravity
properties.description: SSpecifies the vertical gravity of the widget.

properties.name: Background
properties.description: Specifies the background of the widget.

properties.name: Elevation
properties.description: Specifies the elevation of the widget.
info: The widget displays a shadow according to its elevation.
In order for the shadow to be displayed, the widget must have a non-transparent background.

properties.name: LayoutMetrics
properties.description: Specifies the set of properties that the parent of the widget will take to create the widget's measures.

properties.name: PaddingLeft
properties.description: Specifies the space between the left edge and the content of the widget.

properties.name: PaddingRight
properties.description: Specifies the space between the right edge and the content of the widget.

properties.name: PaddingTop
properties.description: Specifies the space between the top edge and the content of the widget.

properties.name: PaddingBottom
properties.description: Specifies the space between the bottom edge and the content of the widget.

properties.name: Padding
properties.description: Specifies the space between the edges and the content of the widget.

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description: Specifies whether the widget is enabled.

properties.name: Visible
properties.description: Specifies whether the widget is visible (true) or invisible (false).
info: Being invisible, it does not occupy any space.

properties.name: Clickable
properties.description: Specifies whether the widget can be clicked.

properties.name: LongClickable
properties.description: Specifies if the widget can be long clicked.

properties.name: Alpha
properties.description: Specifies the opacity of the widget.
